with class "specs" truncateParagraphsByClass('specs', 100); }); + async function loadProducts() { + const container = document.getElementById('productsContainer'); + container.innerHTML = ''; + + try { + const res = await fetch('php/index-product.php'); + const data = await res.json(); + + if (!data.success) { + container.innerHTML = `

${data.message}

`; + return; + } + + data.products.forEach(prod => { + let stars = ''; + for (let i = 1; i <= 5; i++) { + stars += i <= prod.ratings ? '★' : '☆'; + } + + const card = document.createElement('div'); + card.classList.add('col-md-3'); + card.innerHTML = ` +
+ +
${prod.productName}
+

${prod.stock} stocks

+

$${prod.price}

+
+ ${stars} ${prod.ratings}/5 +
+

${prod.description}

+ +
+ `; + container.appendChild(card); + + // Add click event for saving to localStorage + const productCard = card.querySelector('.product-card'); + productCard.addEventListener('click', () => { + const selectedProduct = { + productName: prod.productName, + price: prod.price + }; + + // Save to localStorage (can be replaced or appended to a list) + localStorage.setItem('selectedProduct', JSON.stringify(selectedProduct)); + + // Optional: redirect after saving + window.location.href = 'view-product.html'; + }); + }); + + } catch (err) { + console.error("Error loading products:", err); + container.innerHTML = `
